name: keto almond pita egg salami
description: Indulge in a delightful, high-protein and low-carb meal with our Keto Almond Pita Egg Salami recipe. Perfect for those looking to maintain a healthy lifestyle without compromising on taste. This recipe is packed with the goodness of almond cauliflower pita, topped with savory salami, a sumptuous egg, and a delectable Roman garlic spread. Ideal for anyone following a health-conscious diet while managing their sodium and sugar intake.

recipeInstructions.text: Prep your ingredients: Slice the lemon into wedges, cut the salami slices if not already done, measure the Roman garlic spread, and crack the egg into a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the almond cauliflower pita in the pan until crisp, about 2 minutes per side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the pita and add a little oil or butter to the pan. Cook the egg to your preference, about 3-4 minutes for a runny yolk or 5-6 minutes for fully set.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the Roman garlic spread evenly over the toasted almond cauliflower pita.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Top the spread with salami slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Once the egg is cooked to your liking, place it on top of the salami.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze the lemon wedge over the egg and pita for added zest. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
